    • Constructor Detail

      • DatabaseActions

        public DatabaseActions(boolean verboseSQL,
                       boolean productionDb)
        Constructor for class: Opens a MySQL database and creates a Statement object
        Parameters:
        verboseSQL - when true will print all SQL commands to the console
        productionDb - when true will open the AWS-hosted bank db; false opens the local bank db for testing

      • addCustomer

        public int addCustomer(java.lang.String lastName,
                       java.lang.String firstName,
                       java.lang.String username,
                       java.lang.String passSalt,
                       java.lang.String passHash)
        Adds a customer to the customers table
        Parameters:
        lastName - the contact name being added
        firstName - the contact phone being added
        username - the customer's username
        passSalt - the hashed salt for the customer's password
        passHash - the hashed customer password
        Returns:
        the customerId of the created customer if successful; -1 if unsuccessful

      • makeCustomerListFromDatabase

        public java.util.List<Customer> makeCustomerListFromDatabase()
        gets all customers from the database and returns an ArrayList of Customer objects sorted by last name, first name
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Customer objects

      • checkLoginCredentials

        public int checkLoginCredentials(java.lang.String hashedUsername,
                                 java.lang.String hashedSalt,
                                 java.lang.String hashedPassword)
        queries the database for unique hashed username and hashed password combination
        Parameters:
        hashedUsername - the hashed username
        hashedSalt - the hashed password salt
        hashedPassword - the hashed password
        Returns:
        the customer id corresponding to the username and password record
